article_metadata.title: Faces of mental illness, 3 years later: Susan De Souza | The Modesto Bee

og.description: When The Modesto Bee reported on the abysmal state of Stanislaus County’s mental health system in 2012, Susan De Souza called herself one of the “in-betweens”: people not sick enough to be eligible for public help, but too poor to afford insurance on their own.
